events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car on Main Street during rush hour, requesting to file a new insurance claim.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the reported keywords related to vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident case promptly to ensure swift processing.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the investigation would begin shortly.
The agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and driver's license to proceed with the auto accident claim.
Customer provided all requested documents including accident photos and police report to support the vehicle collision claim.
Investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident was initiated to verify liability and extent of damage.
The investigation concluded that the customer was not at fault and damage to their vehicle was confirmed after inspection.
A fair settlement offer was presented to the customer covering vehicle repairs and rental car expenses during repair time.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the quick resolution efforts.
The claim was formally approved following the customer's acceptance of the settlement terms and conditions.
Insurance payment was issued to cover vehicle repair costs and associated expenses as per the approved claim settlement.
The auto accident claim was officially closed following successful payment and customer confirmation of issue resolution.
All related documents and investigation reports for the auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
